Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory527.png'}
{3: 'Although this is only one small goal: win a commemoration award and then stop...'}
{3: 'But even then, you managed to get third place.'}
{3: 'After having so much fun with Liv and Ellie, you hardly realize that the event is about to end.'}
{2: 'This time we need to win a commemoration award.', 3: '7'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Alright, but this game...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv feels apprehensive about a two-player game by the name of "Rough Seas".'}
{3: 'Two players must remain balanced on a shaking platform for a designated time. If either player falls, the game is over.'}
{3: 'On top of that, a rope ring is the only thing players can use for leverage to balance on the platform so narrow that it forces the two players to press closely against each other.'}
{3: 'Considering the need for safety in the game, only two adults are allowed to participate. Because of that, everyone seemed to avoid it.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Looks like no one has beaten this game…', 4: '1'}
{2: "Isn't that a good thing?", 3: '15'}
{2: "Anyway, it's just a commemoration award, right?", 3: '16'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Wait for us here, Ellie. Okay?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She nods earnestly and watches you two walk away.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory310.png'}
{3: 'After signing up for the challenge, you and Liv stand on the platform.'}
{3: "Just as you are about to grab the rope ring, your hands touch Liv's."}
{3: "She doesn't say anything, but her expression is clear."}
{2: 'Come a little closer.', 3: '30'}
{3: 'Liv shyly steps closer.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's just a commemorative award. Shouldn't we just fail on purpose?", 4: '1'}
{2: "We don't want to worry Ellie.", 3: '35', 4: 'We better not throw the game too obviously.', 5: '36'}
{3: 'Liv looks back at Ellie standing outside the challenge area. Just like you said, she looks nervously at the platform under your feet as if worried something dangerous could happen.'}
{3: 'Liv looks back at the staff member beside her, who is checking the stability and seems worried that the difficulty might be too high since no one has won.'}
{2: 'Staff Member', 3: 'Alright, get ready!'}
{2: 'Hold on to me tight, Liv!', 3: '39', 4: 'Pardon me.', 5: '40'}
{3: "You smile and put an arm around Liv's waist."}
{3: 'Liv blushes as you two get closer.'}
{3: 'But right as the machine starts, she grabs onto you tightly out of reflex.'}
{3: 'The platform begins to sway slowly like gentle waves, gradually increasing to the strength of a typhoon. However, Liv quickly gets into the rhythm.'}
{3: 'Her posture remains firm, and her hands show no sign of letting go.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Sorry for troubling you on a holiday...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I like seeing you happy, Liv.', 3: '50', 4: "We're like family.", 5: '51'}
{3: 'The girl lowers her head and covers her face as if on the verge of tears.'}
{3: 'Right at that moment, the indicator light next to you sounds an alarm indicating an increase in amplitude.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Careful, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: "Why don't we just fall?", 3: '57', 4: "We'll miss the award if we hold on any longer.", 5: '57'}
{3: 'Holding on to you tightly, you both let go right as the platform starts to sway to the right—'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: '—And fall into the ball pit below.'}
{2: 'Staff Member', 3: 'Challenge failed!'}
{2: 'Staff Member', 3: "Oh, come on... Maybe we shouldn't have this game next time…"}
{3: 'The staff member groans to the console and stops the shaking platform.'}
{3: 'The soft voice in your arms is trembling. She casts a concerned and inquiring look at you.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Good thing we fell into this ball pit...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Yeah, you're right. Let's get up."}
{3: "Liv seems distracted as if she hadn't recovered from the fall just now."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ellie', 3: 'Are you two alright?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As the barrier of the challenge area opens, Ellie rushes in, not even taking the time to pick up the commemoration award.'}
{2: "We're okay. Let's grab the reward.", 3: '82'}
{3: 'She lets out a big sigh of relief.'}
{2: 'Ellie', 3: "Granny's here, too! Look!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Looking in the direction she's pointing to, a middle-aged woman finishes talking to the staff and walks over with a smile."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lady', 3: 'Hello, everyone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lady', 3: 'Here, take these Star Tickets. And here is a "commemoration reward."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Thank you. It was nothing.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lady', 3: 'These activities themselves are meant to involve children, but you still deserve the reward for your efforts.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lady', 3: "You're welcome. Ellie, have a biscuit and play here for a while. I want to talk with this young lady.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Seeing Ellie leave, the lady sighs somberly.'}
{2: 'Lady', 3: '...Thank you for playing with her.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Ellie's parents...", 3: '106'}
{2: 'Lady', 3: "You must've already sensed it by now. This sort of thing isn't anything new in this day and age.", 4: '1'}
{2: "She still doesn't know about her parents?", 3: '108'}
{2: 'Lady', 3: "I'm sure she has some idea...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lady', 3: "They're still so young, but it's just as I've said. Who can turn a blind eye to it in this day and age?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lady', 3: "But I don't want to crush her hopes until she finally recovers from her pain.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lady', 3: 'Something can only be taken one step at a time.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She bows slightly to both of you.'}
{2: 'Lady', 3: 'So I also want to thank you for accompanying her along the way rather than making her face this cruel reality.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "You're welcome. She also gave us some beautiful memories.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lady', 3: "That's all I could ask for.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She nods and turns to leave.'}
{3: 'Off in the distance, Ellie looks at her straw bracelet and smiles brightly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'If only the children here could keep laughing and smiling like this.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Well, that's what we're fighting for.", 3: '126'}
{2: "That's our common goal, Liv.", 3: '128'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You're right... For future peace and a smile on everyone's face."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But also... for you to be... happy... and safe with everyone... I will...'}
{2: "That's okay."}
{2: "I just want to know if you're happy today, Liv.", 3: '134'}
{2: "That's enough.", 3: '137', 4: 'Then so am I.', 5: '137'}
{2: 'Lucia and Lee are probably waiting for us.', 3: '141'}
{3: 'She looks up and smiles a warm smile of genuine "happiness."'}
